data.title: The Drowsy Chaperone

data.text:
KW Musical Productions

Presents

The Drowsy Chaperone

A Musical within a Comedy

On stage at the Registry Theatre November 6-15, 2014

Mayhem, mix-ups and an uproarious wedding mark the high-spirited hijinks of The Drowsy Chaperone, winner of five Tony Awards. The fun begins when a die-hard musical fan plays his favourite cast album, a 1928 smash hit called The Drowsy Chaperone and the show magically bursts to life. Suddenly the man finds himself immersed in the glamorous, hilarious tale of a celebrity bride and her impending nuptials, complete with thrills and surprises that take both the cast and the audience soaring to the rafters.

Be transported to a magical, wonderful world in this new musical comedy! Don’t miss the show critics announced as “delightful and sparkling entertainment!” You’ll be over the moon!

Book by Bob Martin and Don McKellar

Music and Lyrics by Lisa Lambert and Greg Morrison

Directed by Eric Da Costa

Music Direction by Bob Stalder

Choreography by Sarah Willett

Media
